title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Attendance in millions, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Attendance in millions has increased over the Year.

Attendance in millions is roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Max Attendance in millions about 77.0 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Attendance in millions about 66.1 was recorded at Year 2011
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Attendance in millions, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010 to 2015.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
